mapper.select: select id, event_name, event_code, event_type, template_identification, product_identification, status, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from product_event where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into product_event(event_name, event_code, event_type, template_identification, product_identification, status, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{eventName}, #{eventCode}, #{eventType}, #{templateIdentification}, #{productIdentification}, #{status}, #{description}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into product_event(event_name, event_code, event_type, template_identification, product_identification, status, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.eventName},#{entity.eventCode},#{entity.eventType},#{entity.templateIdentification},#{entity.productIdentification},#{entity.status},#{entity.description},#{entity.createBy},#{entity.createTime},#{entity.updateBy},#{entity.updateTime})

insert into product_event(event_name, event_code, event_type, template_identification, product_identification, status, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.eventName},#{entity.eventCode},#{entity.eventType},#{entity.templateIdentification},#{entity.productIdentification},#{entity.status},#{entity.description},#{entity.createBy},#{entity.createTime},#{entity.updateBy},#{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update event_name = values(event_name)event_code = values(event_code)event_type = values(event_type)template_identification = values(template_identification)product_identification = values(product_identification)output_data = values(output_data)status = values(status)description = values(description)create_by = values(create_by)create_time = values(create_time)update_by = values(update_by)update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update product_event
event_name = #{eventName},
event_code = #{eventCode},
event_type = #{eventType},
template_identification = #{templateIdentification},
product_identification = #{productIdentification},
status = #{status},
description = #{description},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from product_event where id in
#{id}
